patterns.name: shadcn-vue component installation
patterns.description: Use `npx shadcn-vue@latest add <component> --yes` to install components. Dialog is automatically installed as a dependency of Command.

taskLogs.implemented: Integrated ShortcutsHelp modal into default layout. Added keyboard shortcuts: Cmd/Ctrl+/ and Cmd/Ctrl+Shift+/ (for ?) to open help. Connected CommandPalette's @openShortcutsHelp event to open the modal. Escape closes automatically via Dialog component behavior.
taskLogs.learnings: Cmd+? is actually Cmd+Shift+/ on keyboard, need to register both / and Shift+/ variants for complete coverage.

taskLogs.implemented: Created ShortcutsHelp.vue modal component using shadcn-vue Dialog. Displays all keyboard shortcuts grouped into Navigation, Actions, and Help categories. Includes platform detection (Mac vs Windows) to show correct modifier key symbol. Keyboard keys styled with proper kbd element styling (border, rounded, monospace font).
taskLogs.learnings: navigator.platform for Mac detection. Computed property for dynamic modifier key (âŒ˜ vs Ctrl). Structured shortcut data makes it easy to maintain and extend.

taskLogs.implemented: Added 4 direct keyboard shortcuts: 1) Cmd/Ctrl+J opens palette pre-filtered to PRDs via new defaultSearch prop on Command component, 2) Cmd/Ctrl+Shift+T toggles Document/Task Board tabs using localStorage and StorageEvent, 3) Cmd/Ctrl+. toggles theme via toggleColorMode, 4) Cmd/Ctrl+, opens add repository dialog via exposed method on RepoSelector. Updated Command.vue to accept defaultSearch prop and watch for changes. Updated CommandDialog to forward defaultSearch. Added filter model to CommandPalette that clears when dialog closes.
taskLogs.learnings: defineExpose allows exposing component methods to parent. Watch prop changes to update internal reactive state. Filter model with clear-on-close pattern works well for pre-filtered searches.

taskLogs.implemented: Added working action commands: 1) Toggle theme using useColorMode, 2) Switch tab using localStorage + StorageEvent dispatch for cross-component communication, 3) Keyboard shortcuts placeholder (emits openShortcutsHelp event). PRD page now listens for storage events to react to tab changes.
taskLogs.learnings: StorageEvent can be dispatched manually to trigger cross-component communication via localStorage. The page must listen for 'storage' events on window.

taskLogs.implemented: Added Repositories group to CommandPalette showing all available repos. Uses Folder icon for each repo and Check icon to indicate the currently selected repository. Selecting a repo calls selectRepo() and closes the palette.
taskLogs.learnings: Use flex-1 on span to push trailing icons (like Check) to the right in CommandItem.

taskLogs.implemented: Added dynamic PRD navigation to CommandPalette. Uses usePrd() to get PRD list, useRepos() for current repo ID, and useRouter() for navigation. Selecting a PRD navigates to it and closes the palette.
taskLogs.learnings: CommandItem @select event fires on selection. Include the PRD name in the value prop for better fuzzy search matching.

taskLogs.implemented: Integrated CommandPalette component in default layout. Added keyboard shortcuts for Cmd+K (Meta+k) and Ctrl+K to open the palette. CommandPalette is controlled via v-model:open.
taskLogs.learnings: useMagicKeys uses 'Meta+k' for Cmd+K on Mac. Need to register both Meta+k and Ctrl+k for cross-platform support.

taskLogs.implemented: Created CommandPalette.vue component wrapping shadcn-vue CommandDialog. Includes CommandInput for search, CommandEmpty for 'no results' state, and placeholder CommandGroups for Navigation and Actions with lucide-vue-next icons.
taskLogs.learnings: CommandDialog uses v-model:open for open state. CommandItem value prop is required for filtering.

taskLogs.implemented: Created useKeyboard composable using @vueuse/core's useMagicKeys. Provides onShortcut() to register key combos with automatic suppression when user is typing in input/textarea/contenteditable elements.
taskLogs.learnings: useMagicKeys returns ComputedRef<boolean> | undefined for key combos. Need to check for undefined before using with whenever().

taskLogs.implemented: Installed shadcn-vue Command component with all subcomponents (Command, CommandDialog, CommandEmpty, CommandGroup, CommandInput, CommandItem, CommandList, CommandSeparator, CommandShortcut). Dialog component was also installed as a dependency.
taskLogs.learnings: Command component requires Dialog as a dependency. Both are installed together automatically.
